name: appearance
objective: Check the Home screen settings appearance
description:
The home screen settings window must contain 5 items in the toolbar:
- an icon to go back to system settings menu
- "Applications" tab
- "Widgets" tab
- "Recent files" tab
- "Background" tab (implemented in phase 2, actually only vanilla background settings is used)

steps.description: open user settings in top bar

steps.expected: the tabs must match the above description
